outputs.output_descr: Public Sector Reform - the focus of UNDP's support has aimed at strengthening the capacity of public institutions for advancing the national reform agenda and applying the European standards through the implementation of the ENP Action Plan.  Currently UNDP is supporting strategic reforms of the Civil Service; partnering with a nationally owned Rapid Regulatory Reform "Guillotine" process to improve economic governance, security, and capacity development. UNDP promotes incremental steps towards PAR reform, supporting the efforts of transition countries to shape public administration institutions into robust, representative, responsive and democratic institutions. To this end, within 2012-2013 two key components will be supported within the broader Public Sector Reform focus area of UNDP Democratic Governance Programme namely:  1. Support GoA Guillotine process with regards to public outreach and gender analysis.  2.  Support monitoring of public services including family benefit system and the electronic submission of tax returns.

project_descr: Public Administration Reform: Support the GoA with regards to the Guillotine Process and the Monitoring of Public Services
